tool_description: Restful API to query definitions and examples of physics concepts.
name: Physitionary
title: Physitionary

api_list.name: advanced
api_list.description: Query advanced concepts and examples of physics.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://physitionary.p.rapidapi.com/advanced"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "physitionary.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
